      • addBet

        public void addBet(java.lang.String userId,
          java.lang.String playerEmail,
          java.lang.String type,
          float trate,
          int quantity,
          float rate,
          java.lang.String currency,
          java.util.Date betDate,
          java.lang.String term,
          java.util.Date termDate)
        Method called when the player creates a bet. Creates a bet and persists it into the database. Also sends a mail to the player to notify him of his bet.
        Parameters:
        userId - - player ID
        playerEmail - - player Email
        type - - put or call option
        trate - - current rate of currency
        quantity - - quantity of currency
        rate - - rate at which the player want to buy/sell
        currency - - currency involved
        betDate - - time the bet was registered
        term - - duration of bet selected
        termDate - - end date for the bet

      • removeBet

        public void removeBet(long id)
        Method called to retire a bet from the list after it's gain has been evaluated
        Parameters:
        id - - Bet id

      • getPlayer

        public upmc.stl.aar.model.Player getPlayer(java.lang.String playerId,
                                  java.lang.String playerEmail)
        Searches for a player based on his id. If the player does not yet exist in the database, he is persisted with his email.
        Parameters:
        playerId - - Player Id
        playerEmail - - Player Email
        Returns:
        an instance of the Player

      • creditUsers

        public void creditUsers()
        Method called once per day by the cron at midnight. Renders every player eligible for a daily credit of 500 USD

      • addDailyGain

        public void addDailyGain(java.lang.String playerId)
        Method called when player clicks on the button. Credits player 500 USD and turns false the isEligible property of this player
        Parameters:
        playerId -

      • getBets

        public java.util.List<upmc.stl.aar.model.ProductBet> getBets(java.lang.String playerId)
        Retrieves the list of current bets running for this player.
        Parameters:
        playerId - - player those id we retrieve.
        Returns:
        the list of bets that are waiting for the player

      • getHistoryBets

        public java.util.List<upmc.stl.aar.model.ProductBet> getHistoryBets(java.lang.String playerId)
        Retrieves the historic list of player bets (all those that are completed).
        Parameters:
        playerId -
        Returns:
        the list of bets that have been completed for player playerId

      • getCurrencyRates

        public upmc.stl.aar.model.CurrencyRates getCurrencyRates()
        Retrieves the rate of all currencies stored in the database.
        Returns:
        Text field representing the JSON response received by the API

      • saveCurrencyRates

        public void saveCurrencyRates(java.lang.String p_rates)
        Persists currency rates into the database. Called by the cron to update currency rates in the database
        Parameters:
        p_rates - currency in JSON format

      • calculateGain

        public void calculateGain()
        Method called by scheduled cron task. Calculates the gain/loss for every bet those termination date has expired
